items.sentence: Are you sure Tom isn't the one who did that?
Would it be OK with you if I didn't do that?
What makes you think I need to do that, too?
What makes you think I have to do that, too?
There's no reason why you shouldn't do that.
That's not the way you should be doing that.
Please promise me you won't do that anymore.
It's important for you to do that every day.
It was lucky that you did that when you did.
I'm going to do that the way Tom told me to.
I'd never have done that the way Tom did it.
I wonder why Tom wasn't supposed to do that.
I wonder why Tom is so motivated to do that.
I wonder if Tom is still tempted to do that.
I used to be quicker at doing that than Tom.
I thought Tom would tell you how to do that.
I thought Tom would show you how to do that.
I thought Tom wasn't quite ready to do that.
I thought Tom wasn't going to do that again.
I think that Tom isn't the one who did that.
